data.title: Death of Princess Margaretha At 77 Announced by Danish Court
data.text:
COPENHAGEN, Jan. 4 (UPI)â€”Princess Margaretha of Denmark died today, the Danish Court said. She was 77 years old.

She was the eldest daughter of Prince Carl and Princess Ingeborg of Sweden. Her sisters were the late Queen Astrid of Belgium and Crown Princess Maertha of Norway.

The Danish, Norwegian and Swedish courts proclaimed one week of court mourning until the funeral next Tuesday. Danish flags were ordered at half staff.

A Danish court spokesman said Queen Margarethe and Prince Henrik of Denmark canceled an unofficial visit to Britain scheduled for later this week.
